original_text: We have already learned about how to become clean. We know that leaders put their hands on other Christians to pray for God's help. We know that God will raise dead people to live again. And we know that God will judge every person one day at the end of time.
korean_text: 세례들과 안수와 죽은 자의 부활과 영원한 심판에 관한 교훈의 터를 다시 닦지 말고 완전한 데로 나아갈지니라

sentences.original_text: that leaders put their hands on other Christians
sentences.korean_translation: 지도자들이 다른 그리스도인들에게 손을 얹는다는 것을

sentences.original_text: that God will raise dead people
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님께서 죽은 사람들을 살리실 것이라는 것을

sentences.original_text: that God will judge every person
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님께서 모든 사람을 심판하실 것이라는 것을

sentences.original_text: one day at the end of time
